input.sentences: colorful picture on the wooden boards .
output.sentences: In our town, we have a park where there is a fountain, and some say the place is haunted.
Personally, I think they just say that because there is a sculpture there that is admittedly scary.
The buildings have wooden walls and any picture on the is quite colorful.
I have no idea what a turret is, but my dad said I got a picture of one in the distance.
You have to see it, and when you go pay close attention to the sculpture on the entrance way.
